exercises.name: Focus Switch with Objects
exercises.explanation: Alternate focus between a near object and a far object using your eyes only.
exercises.benefit: Improves focus and reduces blurry vision

exercises.name: Palming Relaxation
exercises.explanation: Cover your closed eyes gently with your palms and relax.
exercises.benefit: Provides general relaxation and relieves light sensitivity

exercises.name: Blinking Game
exercises.explanation: Blink rapidly for a few seconds, then slow down. Repeat this pattern.
exercises.benefit: Helps reduce frequent eye rubbing and dryness
